title: FBS_ANTI (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_ANTI :
Definition of SF_Antivalent function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
An activation has been detected by the FB and the FB is now
activated.

rows.Name: OUT_ENABLED
rows.Comment: The inputs switched to the Active state in antivalent mode.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_NO
rows.Comment:
ChannelNC has been switched to TRUE - waiting for ChannelNO
to be switched to FALSE; discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_NC
rows.Comment:
ChannelNO has been switched to FALSE - waiting for ChannelNC
to be switched to TRUE; discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT
rows.Comment:
One channel has been switched to inactive; waiting for the
second channel to be switched to inactive too; discrepancy
timer started.

rows.Name: ERROR_1
rows.Comment: Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_NO (16#8802).

rows.Name: ERROR_2
rows.Comment: Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_NC (16#8804).

rows.Name: ERROR_3
rows.Comment:
Discrepancy time elapsed in state FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT
(16#8806).
